name: game-service-documents
description: To make it easy for you to get started with GitLab, here's a list of recommended next steps.

scripts.specs: cd specs && multi-file-swagger openapi.yaml > openapi.json && redoc-cli serve openapi.json -p 5001 --template template.html
scripts.specs-build: cd specs && multi-file-swagger openapi.yaml > openapi.json && redoc-cli bundle openapi.json -o documentation.html --title 'Game Service API docs'
